Button ScrollTop GoBack

Go-Back

The headless-goback button directive allow to go-back to previous page using the navigator history api. This directive extends the headless-button directive.

Installation

To get started, install Vanilla-headless via npm:

To get started, install Vanilla-headless via pnpm:

To get started, install Vanilla-headless via yarn:

Use unpkg.com cdn

Use jsdelivr.net cdn

Use

Import vanilla-headless to javascript to initialize the plugin.

Basic example (no styling)

Use additional HTML and CSS to make it unique.

Styled with TailwindCSS

The example require TailwindCSS

Accessibility notes

The headless-goback inherit with headless-button directive interactions.

Mouse interaction

Click the button to navigate to previous visited page.

Keyboard interaction

Command Description
Keydown for Space, Enter Navigate to previous visited page
